definition: cooking method/to boil sb alive (capital punishment in imperial China)

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, Edward was very fond of cooking and foodstuff.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，爱德华非常喜欢烹饪和食品。

sentences.english: Add the sausage to a pan over medium to medium high heat.
sentences.chinese: 香肠入锅，中火到中高火烹饪。

sentences.english: The present invention discloses one kind of electric roaster capable of controlling the oil content of cooked food.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种可控制烹饪食物油脂的电烤炉。

sentences.english: What are the cooking methods of Shandong dishes?
sentences.chinese: 鲁菜的烹饪方法有哪些？

sentences.english: Culinarily , sashimi represents the Japanese cultural appreciation of subtlety.
sentences.chinese: 从烹饪上说，生鱼片代表了日本的精明文化价值观。

sentences.english: ADD salt and tomato paste halfway through the cooking, or later.
sentences.chinese: 在烹饪过程加适量的盐或番茄酱或者稍后加。
烹饪前先把鸡肉串起来。

sentences.english: A brother initiate who is a skilled chef demonstrates vegetarian cooking . vegetarian stuffed cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 烹饪课上，厨师师兄示范美味素食餐点的料理方法。
简的烹饪技巧堪称一绝。

sentences.english: Fresh ginger is used in Asian and oriental cookery.
sentences.chinese: 非洲人和东方人用新鲜的生姜来烹饪。

sentences.english: He studied gastronomy but cannot make a living as a cook.
sentences.chinese: 他学习了烹饪但却无法靠厨艺过活。

sentences.english: I studied Greek cuisine for one year.
sentences.chinese: 我学了一年的希腊菜烹饪法。

sentences.english: Label each picture the appropriate style of cooking potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 请把正确的土豆烹饪方法填到相应的图片下方。

sentences.english: You can feel new ideas and plans cooking up in your head.
sentences.chinese: 你的大脑能在烹饪时迸发出新鲜的想法与计划。

sentences.english: My Futurist experiment in cooking has worked.
sentences.chinese: 我在烹饪方面的未来主义实验凑效了。

sentences.english: This cooking way can make the shell more red, and the meat more tasty.
sentences.chinese: 这种烹饪方法能使虾壳看上去更红，肉质更鲜美。

definition: to stir-fry/to do the cooking/stir-fried dish
to go to the kitchen (to prepare a meal)/to cook
to simmer/soup made by simmering for a long time
to arrange/to handle/to cook/cuisine/art of cooking
